title: Unsceptred Isle : Three of a kind
description: Society has gone to hell.And as the collapse spreads, Jon Maitland is building a wall.A wall that costs him his family.As the world implodes, Baker has become abandoned and lost in this new world.Ridiculed and outcast in his youth, Lattimer is now the lunatic in charge if this asylum known as Launceston.Maitland needs out, Baker wants out, does Lattimer hold the key to the Unsceptred Isle?
author: Joseph V. Sultana
